example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PUNC :) (S (PUNC ") (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يساور) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1P نا)) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM القلق)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تصرف) (NP (NOUN_PROP اميركا))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC حيال) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المعارضة))))))))

arg.g: the anxiety of America's behavior toward this opposition

example.arg: القلق من تصرف اميركا حيال هذه المعارضة
